html:
4.30.20  7:30 pm   What drives you to create music and videos? 

      the way things are

4.30.20  7:26 pm   What is your favorite geometric construct?

      the wheel

4.30.20  7:15 pm   Policy on lying?

      for entertainment purposes only

4.30.20  6:29 pm   Do you understand life?

      sometimes

4.30.20  6:08 pm   Should i create a new music playlist if my 1st one is 12 hours long?

      of course

4.30.20  5:44 pm   Opinion on superlatives?

      they're pretty good

4.30.20  5:43 pm   What is you. What is I. Does nothing exist or is it nothing. Is something nothing or something. 

      it's both

4.30.20  4:43 pm   can you send a link to the sheet music you used for some of your songs

      sure

4.30.20  4:29 pm   what does the land of the 2 letter word represent to you?

      opportunity

4.30.20  4:17 pm   are girls ugly

      no

4.30.20  4:15 pm   How many snare drums do I need to make a fine song? 

      1 and a half

4.30.20  4:03 pm   should I music

      yes

4.30.20  3:54 pm   Did I forget anything

      yes

4.30.20  3:47 pm   What is your favorite word

      plow

4.30.20  3:30 pm   What do I do if North Korea decides to end the entire world?

      start it again

4.30.20  3:22 pm   Hello and goodnight do you feel alright?

      yes and no

4.30.20  3:12 pm   where is the lamb sauce

      could be on the lamb

4.30.20  3:09 pm   Has your opinion of your early, very short videos changed over time? For instance, are you more or less proud of them now than you were when you made them?

      no

4.30.20  3:06 pm   Did you invent anything?

      yes

4.30.20  2:58 pm   bill, im stuck in the same rut that you were once stuck in. I feel like I can't write songs. part of it comes from this feeling inside when I try to write that is something along the lines of "who do you think you are to be trying to write songs". I don't even know what to write about but I love music so much that I just have to make songs. what should I do?

      a good method people sometimes use for tuning a guitar string, is to bend it far out of tune, and then bend it gradually back up into tune. well, i think this might be a good strategy for songwriting, if you are feeling lost. Shoot way outside the boundaries of what anyone may think a 'song' is supposed to be..... and then gradually dial it back into more reasonable territory. i guarantee there will be some wild discoveries along the way

4.30.20  2:47 pm   With your music videos, do you ever change the song to match a new visual idea or are the songs (pretty much) set in stone beforehand?

      the audio is entirely done before the video. that's if it's a song. if not a song video, then the audio is not finalized until after the video

4.30.20  2:44 pm   It comforts me that you're answering questions here. "I just did a bad thing" keeps going through my head, even though I don't recall recently doing a really bad thing. Do you think my moral standards might be way off?

      no

4.30.20  2:39 pm   How do you pass the time in quarantine?

      the same way you pass the time in a race

4.30.20  2:12 pm   what am i so worried for?

      you want to make sure things are good

4.30.20  1:45 pm   For how long have you been writing your own songs?

      almost my whole life

4.30.20  1:13 pm   Is time travel a thing?

      time is actually required, for travel

4.30.20  12:59 pm   What is the best "your mom" joke?

      your mom is nice

4.30.20  12:55 pm   is it data or data?

      dater

4.30.20  12:34 pm   have you seen any good meme?

      yes, i saw a football once

4.30.20  12:31 pm   what was the bad thing you did?

      did a thing that was so medium it was entirely unclassifiable as good or bad

4.30.20  12:11 pm   are you god?

      i thought you were

4.30.20  12:05 pm   do you think those 3-D glasses are cool?

      the coolest ones are the RealD ones, but those unfortunately rely on having a special movie theater screen. For a regular screen, the only options i know of are red/blue, and mirror offset. red/blue makes your head wanna explode and it ruins the colors in the video. And with mirror offset, you're gonna see extra copies of the entire screen on either side. It seems like the only real viable option for 3D viewing is something that actually displays the video in front of each eye, like an AR or VR device

4.30.20  12:00 pm   why does it show that there are no questions today?

     because as of the time you asked this question, i had not yet answered any from that day

      4/30/20, am I the first?

      no

4.30.20  11:46 am   whats the correct way to use a toothpick

      use it to open a bag of floss harps

4.30.20  10:59 am   If there is music theory, is there music conspiracy theory?

      yes. actually all music theories are conspiracy theories. but as always, the truth is a little more complicated, with different sides to every story

4.30.20  10:52 am   Why are you so amazing?

      it's a conspiracy that i've commited against myself

4.30.20  10:07 am   what time is it?

      Thursday, April 30, 2020 6:44:34 PM

4.30.20  9:55 am   How do you stop being anxious

      start writing your own folk tales

4.30.20  9:38 am   Do you think that the world is going to end this year?

      no

4.30.20  9:36 am   Can you make another song?

      not with that attitude. you make it sound like i'm only gonna do 1

4.30.20  9:24 am   If bill wurtz is so good why is there no bill wurtz 2

      oh man i have a surprise for you

4.30.20  9:17 am   Whats a good speech topic?

      public speaking

4.30.20  8:28 am   Are you god? I feel like your god,,

      i thought you were

4.30.20  7:41 am   Hi, how can I create the universe?

      the bad news is it's impossible, but the good news is you already did it

4.30.20  7:38 am   what time is it i guess 3pm

      oh man, you were close

4.30.20  7:25 am   why do bad things happen

      to make the good things stand out more

4.30.20  6:49 am   why do birds fly south for the winter?

      to stay warm (i think)

4.30.20  6:48 am   add something to my shopping list

      a new car

4.30.20  6:47 am   How do you make stuff?

      impossible. it can't be done

4.30.20  5:39 am   Is today the tomorrow of yesterday?

      yes, that's exactly what it is
